stepTitle: The average temperature (in degrees Celsius) of a city in the northern United States can be modeled by the function $$T(x)=5+18sin\left(6\pi \left(x-4.6\right)\right)$$, where $$x$$ is time in months and $$x=1.00$$ corresponds to January $$1$$. Find the values for $$x$$ for when the average temperature is $$21$$ C.
